desc: Contemporary, luxury homewares with a furry canine feel. Here at Rosie Loves Bruce you will find we’re effortlessly engaged in making your room beautiful yet purposeful, we also offer the best in Scottish themed gifts for your loved ones …

layout.text: Our new range tells the tale of a Victorian sweet shop with striped canopies, a world full of the glistening green of the sea and the glow of Scottish heather.
